summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD MUSTANG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT CONTACTED THE WALKER FORD DEALER AT (727) 450-4250 AND THEY CONFIRMED THE PARTS WAS NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE ISSUE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT NHTSA STATED THE VEHICLE WAS SAFE TO DRIVE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED ANY FAILURES. THE VIN TOOL CONFIRM PART NOT YET AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 11/03/17*LJ    THE CONSUMER STATED THE DRIVER'S AIGBAG WAS REPLACED. THE PATS WERE STILL UNAVAILABLE FOR THE PASSENGER'S SIDE AIR BAG. *JS
